name: Electroprone
description:
You playing as a student pumpkin guy, who tries to get some money for his life. Though this time work turns out to be really ptoblematic...
Your goal is to do the cleaning, but for some reason every 10 seconds electrical panel in house goes crazy, so you'll have to fix it immediately. If you not - you lose!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 51.

How to play:
Things you have to do to complete game: pick up all trash and take it to bucket on kitchen, and clean the floor, kitchen cabinets, table and fridge. You can take mop, glass cleaner and rag at once, but you can hold only one bunch of trash. The countdown starts when you pick up first item. When 10 seconds elapses, you'll have to fix the electric panel on the top. To do this, you'll have to bring every control so it will collide green marks. You only have 5 seconds for it.

After you fix the panel, you'll have 10 seconds again to do tasks. Timer stops after all tasks are finished.

Game was made using:

  • Godot as game engine
  • Aseprite as sprite editor
  • Reaper as sound editor

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - Movement
  • LShift - Run
  • Space - Interaction

Used font: Gouranga pixel

Have fun!
